post.body: think that describes both of us...
awesome. rockin to kexp, lining up candidates for our new SEO/ SEM director, getting some projects knocked out. how r u?
hash tag to show who the first person you stalked - err, followed on twitter was. think they're building a map...
no, their "email". was sourcing, think i sent out too many similar messages.. probably looked like spam to them
nah, was using FB's messaging system too much - they hate that apparently, disabled my account. supposedly will reset soon
I'll give you Punch Drunk Love (because I've seen it). But, then, Lewis had The King of Comedy (wait.. didn't see that either)
granted, my boolean skills are impacted by too much rum right now...
"c cup" + thin + "she smiled at me" + (blond OR brunette OR "red head" + bald + "i have no idea what color") + "i overtipped"
ahhh. the old: "not too shaggy" + "nice racks" = quality cuts algorithm. sweet.
and how the hell is the poor guy going to evaluate them? We aren't built for that...
totally. want to check out Lucky's, or Foundation Lounge?
jealous. have you had the dungeness crab encrusted prime rib at dirty dan's yet?
you home for the holidays, or did they finally wise up and ban you from OK? if so, let's get sloshy some night
btw - flycast for iphone? rocks. can carry kexp 90.3 with me wherever i go... and that's some kinda awesome
#firstfollow @clarklesparkle
why is adam sandler funny? i like his movies, but honestly they're all pretty mediocre. is he our jerry lewis? do the young french love him?
son at an ornament sat night. er doc (who looked like guy from House) said: "darwin'll sort this one out". effing love that doctor...
just saw that Spoke thinks I work somewhere called postmodern42 in DC - along w/2 former colleagues. huh? http://tinyurl.com/6wg36y
Twitter handle-squattting (yeah, I know, sounds icky): http://tinyurl.com/3z4hwl
resident evil wishes it were this cool:http://tinyurl.com/elock And, just in time for xmas, zombie samurais: http://tinyurl.com/szombie
